means: 鸦片制剂（通常用于镇痛或催眠）

word_mean: 阿片制剂，鸦片制剂：含鸦片或由鸦片制成的药物
也指能引起睡眠的一切药物

sentence.Network_en: It was Karl Marx who said, "Religion is the opiate of the people".
sentence.Network_cn: 卡尔·马克思曾说，“宗教是人民的精神鸦片。”

sentence.Network_en: Work no longer could be an opiate anesthetizing him against his feelings and convictions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他再也不用把工作当成麻醉自己情感与意愿的鸦片了.

sentence.Network_en: He cannot sleep, not even after taking an opiate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他睡不着,甚至服了安眠药之后也睡不着.

鸦片（opiate）是笼统的称谓，是指从罂粟未成熟的种子荚的包浆里提炼出的物质，包括可待因（codeine）和吗啡（morphine）。这 …
实用词汇汇总（1） ... norpseudoephedrine 降假麻黄碱 opiate 鸦片剂 opium 鸦片.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun): from medieval Latin opiatus (adjective), opiatus (noun), based on Latin opium (see opium)

entry.tran: （用于镇痛或安眠的）鸦片制剂
entry.def: An opiate is a drug that contains opium. Opiates are used to reduce pain or to help people to sleep.

example.ex: One woman suffered such severe pain she had to take opiates to control it.
example.tran: 有一位妇女剧痛难忍，不得不服用鸦片制剂来镇痛。

entry.tran: （使人忽视重要事情的）麻醉品，慰藉物
entry.def: If you call something an opiate, you disapprove of it because it makes people think less or spend less time on important activities.

example.tran: 起到麻痹作用的大众娱乐

example.ex: It was Karl Marx who said, 'Religion is the opiate of the people'.
example.tran: 卡尔·马克思曾说，“宗教是人民的精神鸦片。”

means.word_mean: 1. a narcotic drug that contains opium or an opium derivative

auth_sentence.content: Marx was right, religion is the opiate of the people.
